page.title: 18Guiness:A conclusion.
page.content: The area covered by this block is not one of great economic importance. Neither is it one of great social significance.But we,as the inhabitants of the region,see it as one of emense natural beauty and friendly welcoming people.It is probably not a place in which one could persuade an impartial stranger to settle down.But it is a place where one is loath to leave for too long,and where one is always welcomed back. Perhaps that is a purely biased opinion,as we,the writers, are members of the community,and would therefore also be the "friendly welcoming people" mentioned above. We are {Guiness Primary School.}
